name: Block Puzzle: Jewel Star
description:
Block Puzzle: Star Gem

Place the Gem blocks into the grid & get the greatest bonuses!
Block Puzzle: Star Gem is a simple, yet challenging to master puzzle game!
Add even more excitement to the puzzle game by enabling block rotation with stars!

Tease your brain with the sparkling Gems

HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the given blocks and put them into the grid
2. Remove the blocks by making full horizontal or vertical lines!
3. You can rotate the blocks by charging the booster gauge!
4. Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get higher score :D

FEATURES
* NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy Gem puzzle anytime, anywhere!
* Free TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
* NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own pace!

NOTES
* Block Puzzle: Star Gem supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
* Block Puzzle: Star Gem contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
